text: You just arrive in time as one last person in line gets in.

Oh there you are. 
What took you so long? 
Hotdogs are not THAT hard to come by aren't they?

One last thing. 
I need to see your papers before I can let you through.
Oh where did I put them...
Seems like your pockets have more than enough space...

Ok, you're good to go. 
Watch out, it might be little crowded there.
